NK003(ga)004:0: 'od zer dri med kyi dkyil chog gi kha skong dbang chog bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun bzhugs so //
NK003(ga)004:1: 'khor 'das kun gyis ro 'dzin grangs med du //
NK003(ga)004:2: sprul nas bskal brgyar brjod kyang mi zad pa'i //
NK003(ga)004:3: yon tan rin chen lhun grub thub pa'i dbang //
NK003(ga)004:4: lha mi'i bla ma de la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK003(ga)004:5: ston mchog dam pa thugs rje ca na de dang //
NK003(ga)004:6: mjal ba'i skal bas dman pa'i rmongs chen bdag /
NK003(ga)004:7: yon tan de mtshungs phyag na pad+mo yi //
NK003(ga)004:8: rnam sprul kun mkhyen bla mas ring du skyongs //
NK003(ga)004:10: dkyil chog bya rgyud rang skad du //
NK003(ga)004:11: bkral phyir de dang mthun pa yi //
NK003(ga)004:12: dbang chog 'chad pa nyes med snyam //
NK003(ga)004:15: gso sbyong sdom pa dag dang ldan pa yis //
NK003(ga)004:16: bdag nyid dag par bya phyir bsnyen par bya //
NK003(ga)004:18: de'i rnam dbye zhib par yid ches khungs btsun ltar dang /
NK003(ga)004:19: gzungs grwa lnga'i lhan thabs chos rje bco brgyad 'jam
NK003(ga)004:20: dbyangs pas mdzad par rdo rje 'chang mkhyen rab chos
NK003(ga)004:21: rje'i gsung sgros bkod pa ni /
NK003(ga)004:22: slob dpon khyim pa yin na nges par blangs dgos /
NK003(ga)004:23: dge slong dge tshul khrims ldan la //
NK003(ga)004:24: gso sbyong yin pas blangs kyang rung //
NK003(ga)004:25: bsrung rgyu zur pa med pas sla //
NK003(ga)004:26: ma blangs kyang rung gsung zhing /
NK003(ga)004:27: dkar gsum la brten pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:28: sgog btsong sogs spangs pa'i gtsang sbra tsam ni mdzad de /
NK003(ga)004:30: spang ba ni legs grub las /
NK003(ga)004:31: til yang bza' bar mi bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:32: la phug sgog pa tsh+wa dag dang /
NK003(ga)004:33: chang skyur rnam pa tha dad dang //
NK003(ga)004:34: cung sed dang ni sran ril dang //
NK003(ga)004:35: de bzhin ma sha'i sran ma dang //
NK003(ga)004:36: til gyi cung sed la du dag /
NK003(ga)004:37: dngos grub 'dod pas rnam par spang //
NK003(ga)004:38: log 'dren dag gi zas kun dang //
NK003(ga)004:39: gtor ma'i kha zas thams cad dag /
NK003(ga)004:40: kri sa ra dang 'o thug dang //
NK003(ga)004:41: gsang sngags bzlas pas rnam par spang //
NK003(ga)004:44: sha chang ke'u btsong dang sgog rdog dang //
NK003(ga)004:45: 'bru mar til dang la phug su ra na //
NK003(ga)004:46: 'byung po'i zas dang lha bshos gtor ma dang //
NK003(ga)004:47: gu long mchod byas gtor ma mi za'o //
NK003(ga)004:49: cho ga zhib mo las kyang bkag pa'i zas ngan pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:61: bde byed la byin pa'i lhag ma dang /
NK003(ga)004:63: rtag tu kham phyed du bcad pa la mi za /
NK003(ga)004:64: zas 'dres pa'i lag pa gdong la mi reg /
NK003(ga)004:65: zas kyi lhag ro lhung bzed du mi dor ro //
NK003(ga)004:67: ngas ni sngags pa kha zas dkar gsum dang //
NK003(ga)004:68: rtsa ba sdong bu 'bras bu tshod ma dang //
NK003(ga)004:69: zho dang nas dang 'o ma mar dag dang //
NK003(ga)004:70: 'bru mar tshig ma da ra 'o kon dang //
NK003(ga)004:71: thug pa dag ni bza' btung yin par gsungs //
NK003(ga)004:73: bya rgyud la chu dbang dngos bstan gtso che zhing /
NK003(ga)004:74: de la bum sgrub dgos pas /
NK003(ga)004:75: bum pa'i rgyu tshad grangs sogs gsang ba spyi rgyud dang /
NK003(ga)004:77: 'phags pa dra bi da'i gzungs chog /
NK003(ga)004:80: bya rgyud spyi rnam ngor chen rdo rje 'chang gis mdzad pa sogs su gsal /
NK003(ga)004:81: 'jug sgo'i bum pa rnam rgyal la bsdus te /
NK003(ga)004:82: de lta'i bum pa gnyis phyag len bzhin bsham /
NK003(ga)004:84: zhes de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi las sngags dang bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis bsang /
NK003(ga)004:85: lha rdzas las grub pa'i rin po che'i bum pa rtsab rtsub dang nag po med pa /
NK003(ga)004:86: dbus kyi dbyibs lhung bzed lta bu /
NK003(ga)004:87: mgrin pa'i dpangs sor bzhi pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:88: mgrin pa'i steng kha'i phyi rol gyi kha khyer gyi 'dab ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du mnyam pa /
NK003(ga)004:90: zhabs kyi gdub kor dpangs sor gcig gi tshad du byas pa /
NK003(ga)004:91: ras dkar po gtsang ma kha tshar ma nyams pas mgul pa la dkris pa /
NK003(ga)004:93: dri bzang po'i chus sum gnyis tsam gang ba'i nang du /
NK003(ga)004:97: dri lnga rnams kyis yongs su gang zhing /
NK003(ga)004:100: 'bras bur ldan pa'i shing dri zhim pos kha brgyan pa /
NK003(ga)004:102: rin po che la sogs pa sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
NK003(ga)004:103: 'khor lo rnam rgyal bum pa'i dung chos kyi steng
NK003(ga)004:104: du bzhag pa la me tog gi phreng ba btags
NK003(ga)004:105: pa / bum pa'i nang du shar gyi cha'i dbus
NK003(ga)004:106: su gdan ser po gru bzhi pa'i steng du pad
NK003(ga)004:107: pa / zla la / na mahsap+t+aa n+aam sogs /
NK003(ga)004:109: bcom ldan 'das dpal sh+aakya thub pa nas /
NK003(ga)004:110: sems dpa'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
NK003(ga)004:111: las bum du pad zla la /
NK003(ga)004:112: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags brjod /
NK003(ga)004:113: khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor sngon po /
NK003(ga)004:114: phyag bzhi g.yas na ral gri dang gtun shing /
NK003(ga)004:115: g.yon na dgra s+t+wa dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
NK003(ga)004:116: bum pa'i mtshan ma yang lha de rnams kyi skur gyur /
NK003(ga)004:117: spyan 'dren mchod yon sgrub pa nas /
NK003(ga)004:118: phyag gi bar sa bzung ba'i skabs bzhin las /
NK003(ga)004:119: khyad par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs spyan drangs pa'i rjes su /
NK003(ga)004:120: las bum gyi bdud rtsi thabs sbyor spyan 'dren rigs 'gre sbyar /
NK003(ga)004:124: phyag rdor gyi bstod pa'i rjes su /
NK003(ga)004:126: 'jigs pa'i h'u sgra nges sgrogs shing /
NK003(ga)004:129: 'chi bslu'i skabs kyi bum bzlas kyi dmigs pa gsal bas /
NK003(ga)004:130: gtso bo'i rtsa sngags dang snying po /
NK003(ga)004:133: las bum la bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags rnams brgya rtsa re /
NK003(ga)004:134: stong gsum 'adi'am stong gsum gzhan dag na //
NK003(ga)004:135: lha rdzas mchod yon ji snyed mchis pa kun //
NK003(ga)004:136: bcom ldan bum pa'i lha la bdag 'bul na /
NK003(ga)004:137: thugs rjes 'gro ba'i don du bzhes su gsol //
NK003(ga)004:140: stong gsum sogs tshig gzhan 'dra ba la /
NK003(ga)004:144: sngags a h+aa ra sogs kyis bum par mchod yon me tog /
NK003(ga)004:146: bcom ldan bum pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis bdag dang
NK003(ga)004:147: rdo rje slob ma rnams la mngon par dbang bskur
NK003(ga)004:148: ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i bya ba mthar
NK003(ga)004:149: ma phyin gyi bar du bgegs thams cad bzlog pa'i
NK003(ga)004:153: bod kyi bla ma kha cig bum pa'i lha ye shes pa gshegs /
NK003(ga)004:154: dam tshig pa zhu ba'i chur bsgoms nas khrus byed par bzhed /
NK003(ga)004:155: slob dpon sangs rgyas gsang bas lha ye shes pa gshegs pa'i gsal kha byung yang /
NK003(ga)004:156: dam tshig pa la dmigs bsal ci yang ma byung ste /
NK003(ga)004:157: rnam 'joms kyi dkyil chog 'ga' zhig nas lha zhu ba yang bshad 'dug pas /
NK003(ga)004:158: zhu bar bya ba yang rung ngam /
NK003(ga)004:159: yang na bdag la bsdu bar bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:160: zhes gsungs pa'i phyag len la /
NK003(ga)004:161: sgrub mchod tshar du byed kyang nyin re bzhin bsam nas /
NK003(ga)004:162: gsol gdab kyi bar bum pa bsgrub /
NK003(ga)004:164: rdul tshon gshegs gsol gyi skabs /
NK003(ga)004:165: mdun bum gnyis kyi ye shes pa gshegs /
NK003(ga)004:166: ras bris yin na mdun bskyed la brtan bzhugs dang /
NK003(ga)004:167: bum pa'i ye shes pa gshegs /
NK003(ga)004:168: dam tshig pa rnams rang lhar gsal ba'i thugs kar bstim /
NK003(ga)004:169: rang gi lha'i sku gzugs zla ba'i steng gi yi ge la thim sogs mdzad de bum sgrub bo //
NK003(ga)004:170: de nas slob ma legs par brtags te snod du mi rung ba spang zhing /
NK003(ga)004:171: dkon mchog gsum la dad pa /
NK003(ga)004:172: theg pa chen po la mos shing gsang sngags la
NK003(ga)004:173: bsgrub blo drag po yod pa gcig nas nyi shu
NK003(ga)004:174: rtsa lnga'i bar zung du ma gyur pa nang gshin
NK003(ga)004:176: gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos nas slob dpon la yon phul /
NK003(ga)004:178: las kyi rdo rjes me tog bkye bsdu byas te /
NK003(ga)004:179: badz+ra b+h+au mi nas thams cad kyis yongs su gang
NK003(ga)004:180: ba 'di nyid bla ma dang bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya
NK003(ga)004:181: thub pa tha mi dad pa la sta gon gyi
NK003(ga)004:182: chos rnams zhu ba'i yon du dbul bar bagyi'o //
NK003(ga)004:183: i dam gu ru man+dala kam nir+ya ta y+aa mi /
NK003(ga)004:185: gsol gdab spyi rgyud na med /
NK003(ga)004:186: slob ma rnams shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug pa la /
NK003(ga)004:187: kha cig gsang sngags sgrub pa'i phyir //
NK003(ga)004:188: de las gzhan pa bsod nams 'dod //
NK003(ga)004:191: 'jig rten pha rol ched du ni //
NK003(ga)004:192: dad pa chen po skyed byas nas //
NK003(ga)004:195: 'jig rten pha rol don du ni //
NK003(ga)004:199: zhes pa'i don bshad pa la bsam pa rab 'bring tha gsum las /
NK003(ga)004:200: rab sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas
NK003(ga)004:201: thob par bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor du 'jug par
NK003(ga)004:202: bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed cig /
NK003(ga)004:204: don dran bzhin pas rjes zlos gyis shig /
NK003(ga)004:206: srog chags duhkha zhi bya'i phyir //
NK003(ga)004:208: byang chub bar du bdag brtson no //
NK003(ga)004:209: zhes lan gsum gyis skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
NK003(ga)004:210: byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug la /
NK003(ga)004:211: de nas bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags bzlas pa'i spos chus mgo la gtor zhing /
NK003(ga)004:212: lag pa bshal la lan bdun bzla /
NK003(ga)004:213: de nas dri bzang gi bskus pas lag pa mgo la bzhag ste /
NK003(ga)004:214: b+h+r+au dang bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags lan bdun bzlas /
NK003(ga)004:215: de nas las kun byed pa'i sngags /
NK003(ga)004:217: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis spyi bor dgram zhing bzla /
NK003(ga)004:219: de nas las kun byed pa yi //
NK003(ga)004:220: sngags kyis spyi bor dgram zhing bzlas //
NK003(ga)004:223: spyi rnam na med pa brtag /
NK003(ga)004:224: de nyid bzlas pa'i dris bsang gtor bya /
NK003(ga)004:226: de nas slob ma rnams dri'i dkyil 'khor gyi lho
NK003(ga)004:227: phyogs su kha byang du bltas te thal mo sbyar
NK003(ga)004:228: nas 'khod pa la u dum+w+aa ra'am /
NK003(ga)004:229: ashwar+tha rma med pa ha cang mi sbom /
NK003(ga)004:230: ha cang mi phra ba sor bcu gnyis pa la dri'i chus bkrus /
NK003(ga)004:233: bdug pas bdug la lag pas reg nas /
NK003(ga)004:234: dzi na dzika lan bdun bzlas la mgo zhabs mnyam
NK003(ga)004:235: par me tog btags la slob ma kha shar du
NK003(ga)004:236: phyogs pa'i mdun du ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru
NK003(ga)004:237: bzhi pa byas la so shing byin te /
NK003(ga)004:238: des so shing gi rtse mo nas 'chos te mdun du ltos pa med par dor bas /
NK003(ga)004:239: rtse mo bdag la blta ba dang /
NK003(ga)004:242: mtshams dang byang du blta na 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub /
NK003(ga)004:243: mthur du blta nas 'og gi dngos grub 'grub par shes par byas la 'khod de /
NK003(ga)004:244: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i dri'i chu khyor bar blug la lan bdun blud /
NK003(ga)004:245: de nas slob mas langs la phyi rol du kha bkru bar bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:246: de nas gzhon nu ma'i bkal ba'i skud pa la /
NK003(ga)004:247: las thams cad pa lan nyi shu rtsa dgu bzlas
NK003(ga)004:248: te mdud pa bor la slob ma'i dpung pa la
NK003(ga)004:250: bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skud //
NK003(ga)004:251: blangs nas bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas //
NK003(ga)004:252: zhes pa dpe gzhan rnyed na brtag /
NK003(ga)004:253: de nas ku sha che chung gnyis la sngags bzlas te byin /
NK003(ga)004:254: de nas slob ma rnams la chos zab mo bshad pas spro ba bskyed par byas te /
NK003(ga)004:255: 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen dag /
NK003(ga)004:257: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur //
NK003(ga)004:258: zhes pa'i bar rnam snang mngon byang las 'byung ba spyi 'gro bzhin brjod de don bshad la /
NK003(ga)004:259: ku sha bting ba'i sa gzhi la kha shar du phyogs pas nyal du bcug ste /
NK003(ga)004:260: nangs par snga bar langs nas rmi lam dris la
NK003(ga)004:261: sangs rgyas mthong ba la sogs pa'i rmi lam rab
NK003(ga)004:262: 'bring tha gsum mthong na dngos grub rab 'bring tha
NK003(ga)004:263: gsum lung bstan / ngan na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg
NK003(ga)004:264: gi cho gas ba'i mar gyi bsreg blug brgya rtsa
NK003(ga)004:265: brgyad byin la zhi bar bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:267: dngos gzhi'i skabs dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod yan dkyus bzhin 'dir bum sgrub /
NK003(ga)004:269: slob dpon bdag 'jug bya ba spyi rgyud na mi gsal yang /
NK003(ga)004:270: cho ga zhib mor gsungs pas /
NK003(ga)004:271: bla ma'i bya ba rnams gtso bos mdzad /
NK003(ga)004:272: las kyi slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams las thams cad kyi khro bos byas par bsgom /
NK003(ga)004:273: slob ma'i bya ba rnams rang gis byas par bsgoms la /
NK003(ga)004:276: gsol ba gdab cing bsrung ba /
NK003(ga)004:277: chas su zhugs pa nas brtsams te mjug tu dam
NK003(ga)004:278: tshig bsgo ba'i bar slob ma la ji ltar byed
NK003(ga)004:279: pa bzhin rang gis blangs te /
NK003(ga)004:280: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
NK003(ga)004:282: bka' drin btang rag gi man+dala dbul /
NK003(ga)004:283: deng nas brtsams te bdag bran sogs gsum brjod /
NK003(ga)004:285: sngar sta gon du gnas pa'i slob ma rnams khrus byas nang du bcug yon dbul gral la 'khod /
NK003(ga)004:286: las kyi rdo rjes me tog bkye bsdu /
NK003(ga)004:288: thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba 'di nyid bla
NK003(ga)004:289: ma dang bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa tha mi
NK003(ga)004:290: dad pa la / dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug cing dbang zhu ba'i yon du dbul bar bagyi'o //
NK003(ga)004:291: i dam gu ru man+da la kam nir+ya ta y+aa mi /
NK003(ga)004:293: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis
NK003(ga)004:294: gsang sngags spyod pa sgrub pa la yang dag par
NK003(ga)004:295: zhugs pa / 'jig rten pa thams cad las shin
NK003(ga)004:296: tu 'das pa rnam par thar pa'i dal gsang chen
NK003(ga)004:297: du yang dag par gzhug pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:298: chos kyi rgyal srid dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas nyid
NK003(ga)004:299: du lhag par 'gyur bas slob dpon spro bar mdzod
NK003(ga)004:300: cig / ces 'jam dpal rtsa rgyud nas 'byung ba lan gsum gyis gsol ba btab la /
NK003(ga)004:301: de la bar chad bsrung ba /
NK003(ga)004:303: na mo rat+na tra y+aa ya /
NK003(ga)004:304: na mash+tsan+da badz+ra p+aa na ye /
NK003(ga)004:305: ma h+aa yak+sha se na pa ta ye /
NK003(ga)004:308: brtan par byin gyis brlab par gyur /
NK003(ga)004:309: zhes pa'i bar phyag rgya dang bcas pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:311: mgrin pa rnams su go cha byas par gyur /
NK003(ga)004:312: zhes go cha'i sngags rgyas go bskon zhing /
NK003(ga)004:314: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags kyis srung /
NK003(ga)004:315: slob ma rnams las bum gyis chus tram ban+d+ha s+w+aa h+aa dang /
NK003(ga)004:316: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sngags bzla zhing bsang /
NK003(ga)004:317: dzi na dzika ces pas mngon par basngagasa nas /
NK003(ga)004:319: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor btab pa'i gdong g.yogs sbyin /
NK003(ga)004:320: thal mo bkan pa las mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug ste mgo la bzhag la /
NK003(ga)004:321: ta th+aa ga ta ut+b+ha wa ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK003(ga)004:322: zhes de bzhin bshegs pa rigs spyi'i sngags dang phyag
NK003(ga)004:323: rgya 'ching du bcug la der me tog gi phreng
NK003(ga)004:324: ba sbyin / srog chags sdug bsngal nas /
NK003(ga)004:326: gsum gyis skyabs 'gro sems bskyed sngar sta gon du bshad pa ltar byed du bcug la /
NK003(ga)004:327: las kyi rdo rjes sna khrid de /
NK003(ga)004:329: de nas thal mo sbyar la /
NK003(ga)004:330: sarba ta th+aa ga ta k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta
NK003(ga)004:331: badz+ra pra na me na sarba ta th+aa ga ta
NK003(ga)004:332: badz+ra b+han+d+ha nam ka ro mi /
NK003(ga)004:333: zhes pas sgo bzhi nas rim pa bzhin phyag 'tshal /
NK003(ga)004:334: yang nub sgo nas phyag gsum btsal la /
NK003(ga)004:335: de nas 'jug sgo'i bum pa'i chus gtso bo'i snying
NK003(ga)004:336: po'i sngags la badz+ra a b+hi shiny+tsa btags pas spyi
NK003(ga)004:337: bo nas dbang bskur zhing 'thung du yang gzhug ste
NK003(ga)004:338: phyi'i 'jug pa'o // de nas slob ma rnams /
NK003(ga)004:339: bcos ldan 'das dpal sh+aakya thub pa nas /
NK003(ga)004:340: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya mdzad par gyur /
NK003(ga)004:343: lag pa gnyis phan tshun khu tshur bcang nas /
NK003(ga)004:344: mthe bo gnyis brtan par byas pa de'i spyi bor bzhag la /
NK003(ga)004:345: na mahsap+t+aa n+aam sogs lan gsum bzlas la bden pa'i stobs brjod pa ni /
NK003(ga)004:347: dkyil 'khor du ni legs btsud na //
NK003(ga)004:348: lha yi rigs kyi rim pa dag /
NK003(ga)004:352: rigs ni gang gi snod du 'gyur //
NK003(ga)004:353: bsod nams mthu ni ci yod pa //
NK003(ga)004:357: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi thugs ka
NK003(ga)004:358: nas 'od zer dpag tu med pa byung nas slob
NK003(ga)004:359: ma'i snying khar thim pas byin gyis brlabs par bsam
NK003(ga)004:360: ste / 'di ni cho ga gzhan nas bshad pa'i
NK003(ga)004:361: ye shes dbab pa de'i dod po yin pas gal
NK003(ga)004:362: ste / che'o // zhes yid ches khungs btsun du gsungs /
NK003(ga)004:363: lag pa thal mo sbyar ba'i bar du sngar byin pa'i me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
NK003(ga)004:364: me tog rang gi lha la dbul snyam pa byas te /
NK003(ga)004:366: gdong g.yogs dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'o //
NK003(ga)004:367: me tog gang la babs pa de rigs kyi lha yin no //
NK003(ga)004:368: de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol te /
NK003(ga)004:371: da ni dad pa rab tu bskyed //
NK003(ga)004:372: khyod ni sangs rgyas rigs su skye //
NK003(ga)004:373: sngags dang rig pas byin gyis brlabs //
NK003(ga)004:374: 'gro ba phun sum dngos grub kyang //
NK003(ga)004:375: thams cad khyod la mngon du 'gyur //
NK003(ga)004:376: dngos grub phyir ni dam tshig srungs //
NK003(ga)004:377: gsang sngags dag la'ang brtson par gyis //
NK003(ga)004:379: slob mas me tog gis snyim ba bkang nas dkyil
NK003(ga)004:380: 'khor gyi lha la bsngosa nas phyag btsal te lan
NK003(ga)004:381: gsum gtor ro // slob dpon gyis me tog phreng ba de blangs nas /
NK003(ga)004:382: me tog gang la phog pa'i lha de'i snying po'am
NK003(ga)004:383: sngags kyi phreng bar bsgoms te de nyid bzlas la
NK003(ga)004:384: byin / des kyang sngags kyi phreng bar mos pas blangs te sngags de lan gsum du bazla'o //
NK003(ga)004:385: zhes bshad kyang deng sang phyag len me tog gtso
NK003(ga)004:386: bo'i dbu la babs par mos 'bul ba'i stangs ka
NK003(ga)004:387: tsam byas te / gtso bo'i snying po'am sngags bazla'o //
NK003(ga)004:388: de nas slob mas dkyil 'khor la phyag dang /
NK003(ga)004:391: dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i bdag nyid can du gzhug pa ste dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i cho ga'o //
NK003(ga)004:392: dbang bskur ba'i 'os yin na las thams cad pa'i
NK003(ga)004:393: sngags kyis btab pa'i ku sha la sogs pa'i stan
NK003(ga)004:394: gsar pa la kha nub tu phyogs par bzhag /
NK003(ga)004:396: mgrin par go cha byas par gyur zhes pa'i sngags rgyas go bskon la /
NK003(ga)004:397: slob ma rnams bcos ldan 'das dpal sh+aakya thub pa nas /
NK003(ga)004:398: chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bzhugs par gyur /
NK003(ga)004:399: zhes gtso bor bskyed pa gsal btab nas /
NK003(ga)004:400: gtso bo'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya sngar bshad pas gnas lngar gtugs te /
NK003(ga)004:401: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sngags rnams 'don zhing /
NK003(ga)004:402: spyi bor gdugs dkar po la me tog dkar po'i
NK003(ga)004:403: phreng bas brgyan cing ras phran dkar po'i ba dan
NK003(ga)004:404: dpyangs pa bzung / legs par sbyar ba'i bdug pa khro bo'i sngags kyi bdug /
NK003(ga)004:405: g.yas g.yon gyi rnga yab dang bsil yab 'dzin pa dang /
NK003(ga)004:406: spos phor thogs pas spos dbul zhing /
NK003(ga)004:407: slob mas kyang yon phul la /
NK003(ga)004:408: bla mas de la sngags kyis skyon bsal la /
NK003(ga)004:412: zhes pa'i skabs su sbyang ba gcig thob pa 'dra ste /
NK003(ga)004:413: gsal po ma byung bas ma bkod do //
NK003(ga)004:415: shis pa'i cho ga bya ba ni /
NK003(ga)004:416: phun sum tshogs pa mnga' ba gser gyi ri bo 'dra //
NK003(ga)004:419: zhes bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pas snyan pa'i glu dbyangs blangs /
NK003(ga)004:420: bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rgya cher 'don /
NK003(ga)004:421: dung dang rnga bo che la sogs pa'i rol mo bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:422: bla mas yid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha kun la gsol ba btab nas /
NK003(ga)004:423: bum pa rang rang gi sngags kyi bzlas brjod brgyar
NK003(ga)004:424: byas pa rnams legs par blangs nas dkyil 'khor dal
NK003(ga)004:425: bus lan gsum du bskor zhing /
NK003(ga)004:426: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag nas /
NK003(ga)004:427: lha so sor sngags kyi rjes su chu dbang gi sngags btags pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur zhing /
NK003(ga)004:429: thams cad rdzogs pa dang rnam rgyal bum pa'i chu dang gtso bo'i sngags 'don cing /
NK003(ga)004:430: dbang bskur bas mi mthun phyogs dri ma thams cad dag /
NK003(ga)004:431: lha so so'i ye shes thob pa'i sa bon rgyud la bzhag par bsam ste chus dbang bskur ba'o //
NK003(ga)004:432: de nas de bzhin gshegs rigs spyi'i phyag rgya sngar bshad pa spyi bor bzhag la /
NK003(ga)004:433: ta th+aa ga ta ut+b+ha wa ye a b+hi shiny+tsa /
NK003(ga)004:434: zhes rin po che'i cod pan dang dar dpyangs bcings pa cod pan gyi dbang ngo //
NK003(ga)004:435: de nas chus bsangs pa'i gos barjesa nas rak+sha rak+sha
NK003(ga)004:436: m+aam sogs gos kyis sngags kyis gos gsar pa bskon
NK003(ga)004:438: rak+sha rak+sha m+aam sogs gos kyi sngags brjod de /
NK003(ga)004:440: ru ru s+phu ru sogs bzlas pa'i gzhon nu mas
NK003(ga)004:441: bkal ba'i skud pa gsum bsgril mdud pa gsum bor
NK003(ga)004:442: ba'i dbus su bo d+hi tsi'i phreng ba rdog gcig
NK003(ga)004:443: pa'i gdu bu mkhrig ma g.yon pa la gdags par
NK003(ga)004:445: de nas bla mas de'i steng du gdugs bzung la /
NK003(ga)004:446: slob ma thal mo sbyar nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba byed du bcug ste /
NK003(ga)004:447: nub sgo nas gdugs dang bcas pa'i spyi bos btud pa'i phyag 'tshal du bcug la /
NK003(ga)004:449: sngags dang rgyud ni 'dzin gyur pa'i //
NK003(ga)004:450: slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
NK003(ga)004:451: zhes pas lha la phul te /
NK003(ga)004:452: de nas gdugs gzhan du bzhag la /
NK003(ga)004:453: slob ma lag pas blangs te /
NK003(ga)004:455: da ni dkyil 'khor slob dpon gyur //
NK003(ga)004:456: gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin pa dang //
NK003(ga)004:457: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
NK003(ga)004:458: lha rnams kyang ni kun gyis bkur //
NK003(ga)004:459: sems can rnams la snying brtse'i phyir //
NK003(ga)004:460: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin //
NK003(ga)004:461: nan tan bskyed de bri bar byos //
NK003(ga)004:462: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
NK003(ga)004:464: de nas sbyin sreg bya bar bshad kyang deng sang skabs 'dir mi 'grub pa mang bas ma bris /
NK003(ga)004:466: las sngags gnyis bzla zhing las bum gyi chus spyi bo nas gtor nas /
NK003(ga)004:468: 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par
NK003(ga)004:469: dag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor chen po rten dang
NK003(ga)004:470: brten par bcas pa mngon sum du mthong bar gyur
NK003(ga)004:472: gzungs dang snying po rnams klog /
NK003(ga)004:473: slob ma la dbang bskur dus /
NK003(ga)004:474: dkyil 'khor rten dang brten pa'i lha ngo rgyas par bstan /
NK003(ga)004:475: gzungs dang snying po rnams kyang klog tu gzhug go //
NK003(ga)004:476: de nas slob mas me tog gis snyim pa bkang nas lha la dbul /
NK003(ga)004:477: de nas bla ma la yon ci dgos pa dbul /
NK003(ga)004:478: bla mas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK003(ga)004:479: pa'i mdo bklags nas dam tshig bsgo bar bya ste
NK003(ga)004:480: / de ring phyin chad khyed rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)004:481: sangs rgyas chos dang dge bdun dang //
NK003(ga)004:482: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni //
NK003(ga)004:483: rigs sngags gsang sngags tshogs rnams la //
NK003(ga)004:484: dad pas rab tu bsten par bya //
NK003(ga)004:485: rtag par phyag rgya chen po la //
NK003(ga)004:486: khyad par du ni mos par bya //
NK003(ga)004:487: dam tshig can dang mdza' bo dang //
NK003(ga)004:488: bla ma la yang gus par bya'o //
NK003(ga)004:489: lha rnams kun la sdang mi bya //
NK003(ga)004:490: dus mtshams dag tu mchod par bya //
NK003(ga)004:491: ston pa gzhan gyis gzhung mi mchod //
NK003(ga)004:492: rtag tu glo bur mgron mchod bya //
NK003(ga)004:493: srog chags rnams la byams pa'i sems //
NK003(ga)004:494: rab tu brtan pa nye bar bzhag /
NK003(ga)004:495: theg pa la ni dga' rnams kyis //
NK003(ga)004:496: bsod nams dag la nan tan bskyed //
NK003(ga)004:497: bzlas brjod byed la 'bad pa yis //
NK003(ga)004:498: gsang sngags spyod la brtson par bya //
NK003(ga)004:499: gsang sngags rgyud las bstan pa yi //
NK003(ga)004:500: dam tshig rnams kyang bsrung bar bya //
NK003(ga)004:501: dam tshig med pa rnams la ni //
NK003(ga)004:502: sngags dang phyag rgya mi sbyin no //
NK003(ga)004:503: gsang sngags rgyud ni legs bsrung zhing //
NK003(ga)004:504: de yang bdag gis rtogs par bya //
NK003(ga)004:505: zhes brjod la slob mas kyang /
NK003(ga)004:506: gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa //
NK003(ga)004:507: de dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi //
NK003(ga)004:508: zhes de rnams bsrung bar khas blang /
NK003(ga)004:509: slob dpon gyis de rnams la lha rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad /
NK003(ga)004:510: slob mas lha dang bla ma la phyag gsum gsum btsal nas /
NK003(ga)004:512: bdag la rig sngags stsal du gsol //
NK003(ga)004:513: zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab cing /
NK003(ga)004:514: bla mas kyang lha la gsol ba btab la /
NK003(ga)004:515: lha dang bla ma'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK003(ga)004:516: la sngags kyi phreng ba gnas pa las mar me
NK003(ga)004:517: gcig las gnyis chad kyi tshul du byung nas /
NK003(ga)004:518: slob ma'i snying kha'i zla ba la gnas par bsam la /
NK003(ga)004:519: slob dpon gyis rjes zlos byed pas /
NK003(ga)004:521: gong 'og gi lhug pa tshar gcig brjod /
NK003(ga)004:522: lha rnams kyi snying po yang tshar gsum gsum brjod /
NK003(ga)004:523: slob dpon gyis me tog dri zhim po la de rnams bzlas te /
NK003(ga)004:524: bcom ldan 'di la bsnyen pa dang //
NK003(ga)004:528: bcom ldan bdag gis gzung lags kyis //
NK003(ga)004:529: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
NK003(ga)004:530: zhes brjod la spyi bor bzung ste /
NK003(ga)004:531: lha rnams kyi snying po bdun la sogs bazla'o //
NK003(ga)004:532: de nas bla mas dkyil 'khor yang rgyas par bshad do //
NK003(ga)004:533: de nas slob mas kha lag bkrus nas mchod yon /
NK003(ga)004:534: bdug spos la sogs pas mchod pa rgya chen po bya /
NK003(ga)004:536: deng nas brtsams te bdag bran sogs lan gsum brjod /
NK003(ga)004:537: bsngo ba smon lam shis brjod bya /
NK003(ga)004:538: slob ma gzhug cing dbang bskur ba'o //
NK003(ga)004:540: bzlas lung yan chad tshar mtshams su /
NK003(ga)004:546: shis brjod rgyas par grub na legs so //
NK003(ga)004:547: de nas slob dpon gyis bzlas pa ci 'grub bya /
NK003(ga)004:549: de ltar gsang ba spyi rgyud kyi dgongs pa chos
NK003(ga)004:550: rje thams cad mkhyen pas don zhag dkyil chog tu
NK003(ga)004:552: kha 'gengs dgos cho ga zhib mo sogs nas cung zad bskang /
NK003(ga)004:554: de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi khyad par rnams rgyud nyid
NK003(ga)004:555: dang rdo rje 'chang kun dga' bzang pos mdzad pa'i
NK003(ga)004:556: bya rgyud spyi rnam gyis gsal bar phyes /
NK003(ga)004:557: de dang grub mtha' mi gcig pa rnams ma 'dres
NK003(ga)004:558: par rang lugs gtsang mar sbyar ba'i khul tsam lags
NK003(ga)004:559: / nor 'khrul mchis mod gus pas thal sbyar te //
NK003(ga)004:560: kun mkhyen bla ma'i spyan sngar mthol zhing bshags //
NK003(ga)004:561: rnam dag cho ga gsal bar phyes pa yi //
NK003(ga)004:562: dge tshogs gang bskrun byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK003(ga)004:563: zhes pa bdag cag kha ba can pa rnams kyi
NK003(ga)004:564: skyabs gcig 'phags pa thugs rje'i dbang phyug gi rnam
NK003(ga)004:565: sprul 'dzam gling bstan pa'i bdag po rgyal dbang kun
NK003(ga)004:566: mkhyen kun gzigs chen po'i bka' drin kho nas 'tsho
NK003(ga)004:567: ba'i zha lu ba bsod mchog gis /
NK003(ga)004:568: zil gnon khrums zla'i gnyis pa'i phyogs kyi dga' ba
NK003(ga)004:569: gsum pa la zha lu bla brang du sbyar ba'i
NK003(ga)004:570: yi ge pa ni bsod nams rin chen no //
